title: TFT Dragon trait nerf.. When???
body: literally, getting tired of {{champion:136}}  and {{champion:102}} receiving no ability damage because I get a free  Dragon's Claw  for just having 2 Dragons that can fit in any comp. Can you guys lower the magic resist on this thing? not to mention {{champion:80}} is somehow a dragon xD so there 3 champion with a free Dragon's claw like wtf

replies.body:
Just like real league it is easy to negate magic damage but you can only slightly mitigate ad damage.

Trying to make a team comp centered around an ap carry is infuriating
